title: MISSING ADDONS
content: My account suddenly removed ALL of my addons!? After an update! WHY? How can I recover?

title: Firefox & 15 to 20 open tasks always running
content: Firefox constantly has at minimum 10 to 15 tasks open when I have one or two windows open? I've noticed the same thing happening when using MS Edge. Firefox is is always using up way more of my laptop's resources CPU & Memory. It's very frustrating. Please advise.

title: Since new Firefox /  Mozilla download - can no longer open  yahoo mail and several other sites?  Why?
content: Since new Firefox / Mozilla download - can no longer open yahoo mail and several other sites? Why? This includes the Wall Street Journal and an AOL account. Why won't they open? What can I do to fix it? Or should I just stop using Firefox and just use Safari?
